amendment.description: Amendment sought to sunset the provisions in the act after September 30, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 109-387 toprovide that the act shall not be in effect after September 30, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 85 - 322 (Roll no. 36).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Paul.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
